00021 /**
00022  * @file   GenoSeed.h
00023  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00024  * @date   Fri Jun 30 14:44:22 2006
00025  * 
00026  * @brief Abstract interface for a genotyping oracle used for
00027  * genotyping seeds in brlmm. Originally seed calls came from DM, but
00028  * now they are a subject of much research.
00029  * 
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef _GENOSEED_H_
00033 #define _GENOSEED_H_
00034 
00035 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/GenderCalls.h"
00037 
00038 /** Abstract interface for a genotyping oracle used for genotyping
00039     seeds in brlmm. */
00040 class GenoSeed : public GenderCalls {
00041 
00042 public:
00043 
00044   /** How many chips does this object know about. */
00045   virtual int getChipCount() = 0;
00046 
00047   /** 
00048    * Get the call rates for snps for each chip.
00049    * @param callRates - Vector to be filled in with call rates for chrx snps,
00050    * one for each chip.
00051    */
00052   virtual void getCallRates(std::vector<float> &callRates) = 0;
00053 
00054   /** 
00055    * Get the call rates for chrX snps for each chip.
00056    * @param callRates - Vector to be filled in with call rates for chrx snps,
00057    * one for each chip.
00058    */
00059   virtual void getHetChrXRates(std::vector<float> &hetRates) = 0;
00060 
00061   virtual float getHetChrXRate(int chip) = 0;
00062 
00063   /** 
00064    * Get the genotype calls for a particular probeset.
00065    * @param name - name of probeset to get genotype calls for.
00066    * @return - A vector of the calls from dm algorithm.
00067    */
00068   virtual std::vector<affx::GType> getGenoCalls(const std::string &name) = 0;
00069 
00070   /**
00071    * @brief Check if a call exists for a given probeset
00072    * @param name - name of probeset to get genotype calls for.
00073    * @return boolean result
00074    */
00075   virtual bool checkGenoCallsName(const std::string &name) = 0;
00076 
00077   /** Virtual destructor for virtual class. */
00078   virtual ~GenoSeed();
00079 
00080   /**
00081    * Figure out the gender of samples based on the number of het calls on
00082    * chromosome X. This is all very human centric...
00083    */
00084   virtual std::vector<affx::Gender> getGenders();
00085 
00086   virtual affx::Gender getGender(int chip);
00087 
00088 };
00089 
00090 #endif /* _GENOSEED_H_ */
